Patient Intake Forms and Documents

New Patient Form

We welcome new patients.
Whether you have an urgent problem requiring immediate attention, or you are simply searching for regular ongoing dental care, call our office and we will arrange the appropriate appointment for you.
On your first appointment please bring your dental insurance card with you.
For our patients without dental insurance, we offer several convenient payment options including:

  • Cash or Personal Check
  • Credit Card â€“ We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover
  • Care Credit Medical/Dental Card - Care Credit offers 3, 6, 12 and 18 month interest-free payment plans.

Save time. Fill out your new patient forms and send them to us electronically
